Description: Between 21st December 2016 and 20th August 2018 at various sites under the control of PSV Glass & Glazing Limited being an employer within the meaning of the Health and Safety at Work etc. Act 1974 [“the Act”], failed to discharge the duty to which it was subject by virtue of section 2(1) of the Act, in that it failed to ensure, so far as was reasonably practicable, the health and safety at work of its employees, including Jason Rowe, when undertaking work which was liable to expose any of its employees to risk from vibration, whereby it is guilty of an offence contrary to section 33(1)(a) of the Act and liable to a penalty as provided by section 33(2) and Schedule 3A of the Act
